data.event: The earliest reference to Mandu is available in the Sanskrit inscription of 555 AD, which tells that Mandu was a fortified city even in the 6th century BC.

event.title: was snatched by the Khiljis of Delhi in 1305

data.event: It gained prominence in 10th and 11th century under the Parmars (who called it Mandavgarh), from whom control was snatched by the Khiljis of Delhi in 1305.
